title: Easy Tuna Casserole Recipe
description: This tuna pasta casserole is made with macaroni, creamy chicken soup, and Cheddar cheese. Top with crispy fried onions for a very comforting meal.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Seafood Fish Tuna Easy Tuna Casserole 4.3 (1,813) 1,406 Reviews 135 Photos This easy tuna pasta casserole is made with macaroni, creamy soup, cheese, tuna, and fried onions. I got this tasty recipe from my roommate. It's great as leftovers, too. Submitted by LMCDEVIT Updated on February 10, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 135 135 135 135 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 3 cups cooked macaroni 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese 1 ½ cups French fried onions Directions Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine cooked macaroni, tuna, and condensed soup together in a 9x13-inch baking dish; sprinkle with cheese. Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 25 minutes. Sprinkle with fried onions; bake 5 minutes more. Melissa Goff I Made It Print 2,806 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 462 Calories 29g Fat 37g Carbs 12g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 462 % Daily Value * Total Fat 29g 37% Saturated Fat 10g 49% Cholesterol 23mg 8% Sodium 706mg 31% Total Carbohydrate 37g 13% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Total Sugars 1g Protein 12g 23% Calcium 113mg 9% Iron 1mg 8% Potassium 93mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Tuna Casserole 01 of 135 Photo by  Melissa Goff 02 of 135 Photo by  Yo 04/03/2025 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort Crowd-pleaser Family favorite Easy and delicious! I added some frozen cauliflower I had left over from another recipe and sprinkled quite a lot of cayenne pepper and paprika to my family’s taste. Thank you for sharing this great recipe! ;) 03 of 135 Photo by  LilacVeal6700 10/22/2024 Delicious, lacking a little flavor but that's easily reparable. Definitely will be making again. 04 of 135 Photo by  LivelyOnion3828 08/14/2023 My husband and I love the dish! I added 2% milk to empty soup can stir and add, bacon bits with crunchy onions and sliced Cuban bread&butter! I read comments and took a couple tips. 05 of 135 Photo by  Lexy1073 05/29/2023 I followed the for the most part. I added sautéed onions and mushrooms. Looking forward to eating it soon. 06 of 135 Photo by  Rezty Felty 02/24/2022 I added more veggies, and sprinkled the top with cheddar & sourcream potato chips. It was great, everyone asked for seconds! 07 of 135 Photo by  Stormee Day 07/17/2021 08 of 135 Photo by  Kip Hale 01/30/2021 09 of 135 Photo by  Kip Hale 01/30/2021 10 of 135 Photo by  Michele Trout Blake 01/24/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Quick Tuna Casserole 289 Ratings One Pot Tuna Casserole 297 Ratings Easy Macaroni Tuna Casserole 121 Ratings Tangy Tomato Tuna Casserole 10 Ratings Easy Cheesy Tuna Casserole 116 Ratings Tuna Garden Casserole 60 Ratings Kraft Mac and Cheese Tuna Casserole 28 Ratings Easy Slow Cooker Tuna Casserole 3 Ratings Tuna Noodle Casserole with Mushrooms 1 Rating Tuna Noodle Casserole III 252 Ratings Quick and Easy Tuna Casserole 719 Ratings Campbell's Tuna Noodle Casserole 553 Ratings Tuna Casserole III 44 Ratings Tuna Noodle Casserole with Bechamel Sauce 4 Ratings Tuna Noodle Casserole from Scratch 1,731 Ratings Classic Tuna Noodle Casserole 165 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: LMCDEVIT
instructions: Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).;Combine cooked macaroni, tuna, and condensed soup together in a 9x13-inch baking dish; sprinkle with cheese.;Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 25 minutes. Sprinkle with fried onions; bake 5 minutes more. Melissa Goff
